metadata.title: 8 Pcs Sponge Cleaning Brush with Adjustable Handle Feeding Bottle Scrubber, Dishwashing Foam Sponge Brush Cup Cleaning Brush Household Cleaning Brushes for Baby Bottle Kitchen Clean Glasses Mugs Cups
features: What You Will Get: the package comes with 8 pieces of milk bottle brushes in 4 colors, ample quantities can meet your use and replacement needs, and you can also share them with your friends and neighbors

Comfortable to Use: the long bottle cleaning brush has an adjustable handle, you can adjust the length of the handle according to the cup or bottle you are cleaning; The handle has a fixed design, which can be locked by sliding gently, and is applied to fix the telescopic length of the sponge brush

Adjustable Handles: the handle of bottle brush sponge is adjustable, and measures approx. 11.42 inches/ 29 cm before expansion, and about 13.5 inches/ 34.3 cm after expansion, you can adjust the handle length according to your needs; The sponge head is about 3.35 x 2.17 inches/ 8.5 x 5.5 cm, soft and reliable to use

Quality Material: the cup cleaner brushes are made of quality foam heads and PP plastic handles, the sponge is soft and can effectively remove the dirt on the cup, the brush head is not easy to deform or break, high density sponge brush head will not scratch the cup, no peculiar smell, reassuring for you to use

Effective Cleaning: the brush head of this kitchen sponge with handle can achieve 360 degree cleaning without dead ends; The brush head can also quickly enrich the foam to achieve a better cleaning effect, it is a good helper for household cleaning, and suitable for kitchen plates, baby bottles, glass cups, glassware, and more
description: Features: Dishwashing brush with handle has ample quantity, you can use it according to your actual needs, reusable and not easy to deform, which can be applied for a long time. Water bottle scrubber has an adjustable handle for better to clean your cups, milk bottles, and more, light and easy to hang and store without taking too much space.  Specifications: Material: foam, PP plastic Color: as shown in the pictures Size: Brush handle: approx. 11.42 inches/ 29 cm before expansion, and about 13.5 inches/ 34.3 cm after expansion Brush head: about 3.35 x 2.17 inches/ 8.5 x 5.5 cm  Package includes: 8 x Milk bottle cleaning brushes  Notes: Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size. The color may exist a slight difference due to different screen displays.

title: ALINK 6-Pack Sponge Bottle Brush Set, Non-Scratch Scrubber
2Pcs Bottle Soft Brush
